Posts.Content: Oct 14, 2017 08:45PM Qwnlynne wrote: hello, I too just was diagnosed Oct 5th ILC, waiting on MRI, my options are lumpectomy, or mastectomy. Not sure which way I will. My surgeon said due to my BMI, plastics may not want to do re construction right away. Not sure if that means ever? So confused. I don't want flat chest , joined weight watchers to begin losing weight, but don't know if they will do reconstruction.
Posts.Title: I am alone trying to decide between radiation or mastectomy pattiebfromblo shaneswife828
